name: Tidehunter
title: Leviathan's Champion
description: A massive Naga warrior bonded with the great Kraken. This nearly indestructible tank excels at disrupting enemies and protecting allies.

abilities.name: Anchor Smash
abilities.description: Slams anchor into the ground, dealing damage and reducing enemy damage output in an area.

abilities.name: Kraken Shell
abilities.description: Passive: Reduces damage taken and purges debuffs when taking a certain amount of damage.

abilities.name: Gush
abilities.description: Sprays an enemy with water, dealing damage, slowing movement, and reducing armor.

abilities.name: Ravage
abilities.description: Ultimate: Summons tentacles from the ground that damage and stun all enemies in a large area.

texts: Your doom rises from the depths.
